Class AlignmentAnalyzerMetric

java.lang.Object
de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.melt.matching_eval.evaluator.metric.Metric<AlignmentAnalyzerResult>
de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.melt.matching_eval.evaluator.metric.alignmentanalyzer.AlignmentAnalyzerMetric
public class AlignmentAnalyzerMetric extends Metric<AlignmentAnalyzerResult>
The AlignmentAnalyzerMetric is capable of calculating statistics about a finished alignment.
Author:
Jan Portisch
